definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The water is rushing over the barrier, flooding a road.
sentences.chinese: 海水冲垮了防护堤，冲入道路。

sentences.english: A loud buzz swept into street .
sentences.chinese: 一阵乱响的嗡嗡声，以扫荡之势冲入街心。

sentences.english: Add boiled water into the pot and lid it.
If the illness needs, usable a few tepid yellow rice or millet wine are irruptive take.
sentences.chinese: 如病情需要，可用少量温热黄酒冲入服用。

sentences.english: They rushed into the burning house to save the old man.
sentences.chinese: 他们冲入起火的房子中去救那个老人。

sentences.english: Put the rice in the bowl, pour the hot Oolong tea, mix together and serve.
sentences.chinese: 将白饭盛人碗内，冲入乌龙茶，伴匀即可食用。

sentences.english: After a wild gunbattle, police broke into the room.
sentences.chinese: 经过一阵激烈的枪战，警察冲入楼内。

sentences.english: As the cars burst into flames, three members of the gang race into the museum.
sentences.chinese: 汽车燃起熊熊大火，三名盗窃团伙成员冲入博物馆。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar, coconut milk and cream in a container. Pour in hot water, then leave it until cool.
sentences.chinese: 将糖椰奶和炼奶放入容器中，冲入开水，冷却备用。

sentences.english: Tasked with protecting Lord Tyranus, Jango entered the fray against the Jedi.
sentences.chinese: 奉命保护泰拉纳斯尊主的詹戈冲入战场对抗绝地。

sentences.english: He didn’t have any time to react before cops stormed in and placed him under arrest.
sentences.chinese: 他还没来及反应，警察已经冲入房里，将他擒获。

sentences.english: Police rushed into the crowd to drag the demonstrators one by one.
sentences.chinese: 警察冲入人群，设法把示威群众一个个来出。

sentences.english: The incense suddenly exclaimed, and vigorously developed into the room to ready and keep the .
sentences.chinese: 金香突然惊叫，大力和发达冲入房把肃恭驱赶。

sentences.english: Then turn round to hurtle into rain.
The sparks shot up like thousands of shooting stars into the still night air.
sentences.chinese: 火花升腾像数千流星冲入寂静的夜空。

definition: lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
to spill/to overflow (of water, crowds)/to crowd (into a space)
to collide/jerking motion/to impinge/to offend/to provoke
to gush/to gush out/to pour out
